original_text: The hail fell and there was lightning like fire. It was the worst storm anywhere in Egypt since Egypt had become a nation.
korean_text: 우박이 내림과 불덩이가 우박에 섞여 내림이 심히 맹렬하니 나라가 생긴 그 때로부터 애굽 온 땅에는 그와 같은 일이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: and there was lightning like fire
It was the worst storm anywhere in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 이집트 어디에서든 가장 최악의 폭풍이었다

sentences.original_text: since Egypt had become a nation
